duties_responsibilities.duty: Resolve coding quality alerts/edits and address customer’s quality concerns
Verify accuracy of assigned PCS codes for complex and/or error-prone procedures
Review charge and procedure code mismatches
Review codes with revenue integrity for NCD/LCD coverage
Review encounters to determine coding accuracy based on a customer’s specific complaint

education_certification.credential: High School graduate or GED equivalent required
Undergraduate (Associate's or Bachelor's) degree in HIM/HIT preferred
Minimum 1 year of acute care hospital inpatient coding required with 3 years preferred
